technologies.name: Portfolio
technologies.author: Personal
technologies.content: This site is going to be hub for all I have done and all I am about to do. I intended for this site to look like google's page on mobile devices. These are all you need to make something like this (N.B. I hate reinventing the cycle):
bullets: Typescript: Awesome superset of JavaScript
Visual Studio Code: Best in class Code Editor
GitHub: Source Control
Angular CLI: Boon for Angular developer, takes care of build, serve, lint etc.
Angular: For creating sophisticated Single Page Application out of components
Angular Material: To make the site look like Google's mobile site & Android news feed.
Angular CLI GH Pages: To easily deploy the build to GitHub Pages or even Google Cloud Platform
Google Forms: To collect your message and email.
Google Docs: For Resume, All I have to do is update my resume at one place.
Google Maps: To point out my address.
Google Domains: I purchased this domain from Google Domains, got free domain security.
Google G Suite: For customized professional email.
Google Analytics: To analyze each route change, and each button click.
Dialog Flow: Made the chatbot using Google's Dialog Flow.
